trans-unit.source: The MsmqIntegrationBinding class maps Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) messages to [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] messages.
trans-unit.target: MsmqIntegrationBinding 类将映射到的 Microsoft 消息队列 (MSMQ) 消息[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]消息。

trans-unit.source: This binding can be used to enable [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications to send and receive messages to and from existing MSMQ applications that use COM, native C++ APIs or the types defined in the <xref:System.Messaging> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此绑定启用[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]应用程序发送和接收使用 COM、 本机 c + + Api 或中定义的类型的现有 MSMQ 应用程序消息<xref:System.Messaging>命名空间。</xref:System.Messaging>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to instantiate a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> and pass in a security mode.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使你能够实例化的新实例<xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding>并传入安全模式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding>

trans-unit.source: The security mode supported by the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel
trans-unit.target: 消息队列 (MSMQ) 集成通道支持的安全模式

trans-unit.source: The value is not within the range of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不在范围内<xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref> class from the settings of a specified configuration binding element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref>从设置的指定的配置绑定元素的类。

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to place the binding settings in a configuration file but add the actual binding in code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许你可以将绑定设置放在配置文件，但将实际绑定添加在代码中。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_configurationName" name="configurationName" href=""></xref> attribute that identifies the <xref uid="langword_csharp_binding" name="binding" href=""></xref> element whose settings are used to initialize the binding.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref uid="langword_csharp_configurationName" name="configurationName" href=""></xref>该属性标识<xref uid="langword_csharp_binding" name="binding" href=""></xref>其设置用于初始化绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the binding elements in the basic profile stack.
trans-unit.target: 返回基本配置文件堆栈中的绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> that contains the stack of binding elements in the basic profile stack.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>包含基本配置文件堆栈中的绑定元素堆栈。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"></xref> that is associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"></xref>与此绑定相关联。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity> encapsulates Message Queuing (MSMQ) transport security settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity>封装消息队列 (MSMQ) 传输安全设置。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"></xref> that is associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"> </xref>与此绑定相关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the serialization format to be used to serialize or deserialize the message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于序列化或反序列化消息的序列化格式。

trans-unit.source: This property returns an enumeration value that specifies how a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] message will be serialized and deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回一个枚举值，指定如何[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]将序列化和反序列化消息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat"></xref> object that represents the type of serialization to use.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat"> </xref>对象，表示要使用的序列化的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether security information should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指定是否应序列化安全信息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if security information should be serialized; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应序列化安全信息;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
